title: TVS Motor Co to expand electric 2W sales in both developing, developed markets: CEO KN Radhakrishnan
description: TVS Motor Company aimed to broaden its electric vehicle sales in both developing and developed markets, betting on India's potential as a major export hub. The company used its Indonesian plant for the ASEAN region, reporting increased sales. They expanded their EV network in India and planned further product launches.
